title: Flutter & GraphQL - E-Commerce App Basis with Saleor - Flutter in Practice: Special 2

media:group.media:title: Flutter & GraphQL - E-Commerce App Basis with Saleor - Flutter in Practice: Special 2
media:group.media:description: GraphQL is an open-source data query and manipulation language for APIs, and a runtime for fulfilling queries with existing data. GraphQL was created by Facebook. GraphQL provides an interesting alternative to Firebase. In this video we will build a base for a e-commerce app using  Saleor, an open-source framework that provides a GraphQL API for conveniently building e-commerce solutions.
